params._amount: Amount to be paid including Hunter payout + Saloon commission.
params._token: Token the bounty is going to be paid in.

collectSaloonPremiumFees(address,address.details: Transfer already collected Saloon premium fees to _saloonWallet.

params._saloonWallet: Address the Saloon commission will be sent to.
params._token: Token the fees are paid in.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payBounty(address,address,address,uint25.details: Pays bounty and subtracts staker balances according to weight in pool. This implementation uses stakers funds to pay the bounty first before using project deposit.

params._amount: Amount to be paid including Hunter payout + Saloon commission.
params._hunter: Hunter wallet address the bounty will be paid to.
params._saloonWallet: Address the Saloon commission will be sent to.
params._token: Token the bounty is going to be paid in.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

scheduleAPYChange(uint256).details: Schedules a change in APY for a determined amount.

params._newAPY: Amount the new APY is going to be set to once timelock is over.

schedulePoolCapChange(uint256).details: Schedules a change in Pool Cap for a determined amount.

params._newPoolCap: Amount the new Pool Cap is going to be set to once timelock is over.

scheduleUnstake(address,uint256).details: Schedules unstake for a determined amount.

params._amount: Amount to be unstaked from _staker balance once timelock is over.
params._staker: Staker address where the unstaked funds we be returned to.

params._amount: Amount to be withdrawn once timelock is over.

setDesiredAPY(address,address,uint256).details: Set new APY as scheduled. If APY = 0 scheduling is not required. project must approve this address first. project will have to pay upfront cost of full period on the first time. this will serve two purposes: 1. sign of good faith and working payment system 2. if theres is ever a problem with payment the initial premium deposit can be used as a buffer so users can still be paid while issue is fixed.

params._desiredAPY: New apy as specificied when scheduling (if necessary).
params._projectWallet: Project address that will continuously be billed for premium payments.
params._token: Token the premium is going to be paid in.

setPoolCap(uint256).details: Set new Pool Cap as scheduled. if poolCap = 0 scheduling is not necessary

params._amount: New pool cap as specificied when scheduling(if necessary).

stake(address,address,uint256).details: Stake funds into the bounty pool staker needs to approve this address first

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

billPremium(address,address).notice: Bill premium owned since last time paid. this address needs to be approved first

documentation.text:
@dev Calculates how much premium is owed since last time it was paid.
 Loops through variance in total staking balance and takes into account how long it lasted.
